title: "Old Forester" Bourbon label
content:
can anyone make a suggestion for the fonts appearing on this label?

i don't need the hand written script, buy any ideas as to the other fonts would be much appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328042638im_/http:/typophile.com/files/old_forester_3752.jpg)

thanks,

gregg
author: hereandthere

comments.content:
top line - engravers-esque

bottom line - Playbill-esque

The treatment of the **Old Forester** part of the label is similar to the uppercase characters in [this font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328042638/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/kudos-kaps-nf/one/), but not quite.
